name: War Of Cyber Tanks
description:
In the future, the highly intelligent fleet of war machines led by ‘AI Overlord’ has captured our world. Millions are killed in this war. “The Resistance”, group of humans and robots have been in war with ‘AI overlord” for almost a decade. Today they have lost all of their human commanders. Gloo, the Resistance’s robot has identified your skills to lead the war.

You must infiltrate and conquer the enemy base. Defeat all the boss tanks to take down AI Overlord. Remember, you don’t physically go on the battlefield. The physical war zone is digitalized and transmitted to The Resistance Queenship. This data is then decrypted to produce the imagery in scribbles. (Yeah! the engineers are creative!!)

So everything that you see on your screen are scribbles. You control your scribbled tanks and weapons by using twin stick shooting interface. This is a war played like top down shooting game. Use all your maneuvering skill and strategy to destroy the enemies and capture the bases.

Download this free mobile game now, and get ready to save the world.
